events.message: Customer contacted insurance to report a car accident that occurred on April 30th involving a rear-end collision at a traffic light.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords related to vehicle collision and accident type.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned promptly to handle the case and communicate with the insured customer.
The customer received acknowledgement that their claim had been registered and would be investigated within 3 business days.
Requested vehicle damage photos, police accident report, and driver license copies to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of the damages and a copy of the official police report.
Investigation team began examining the submitted evidence and contacted the other party involved to verify accident details.
Investigation concluded confirming fault of the third party and required repairs for the vehicle have been evaluated for coverage.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on repair estimates and policy coverage limits for the vehicle damages.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the handling of the claim process.
Claim was formally approved by the insurance company authorizing the finalized settlement payment to the insured party.
The financial department processed and issued the settlement payment to the customerâ€™s bank account as per the agreed terms.
All claim activities are completed and the case has been officially closed after confirming receipt of the settlement payment.
The case files and documents have been archived following company policy for record keeping and future reference.
